message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. How about a 55/45 split?
I can do 57-43, it's a good compromise considering the inflation.
This is my final offer, Alice. It's a reasonable split considering the time pressure and inflation.

I know it's getting ridiculous, but I'm not going to settle for 50-50 when I have the upper hand. 59-41 is my new offer.
